attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The eco-towns are mostly planed to cover green-belt land which will destroy countryside.

They will not be able to provide jobs and public transport to most of their residents and so people will have to drive to nearby large towns which is distinctly NOT eco.

The government should reconsider the locations, although affordable houses of this type are supported. Perhaps locating them on brownfield sites within existing towns, cities.
